snippet: Rick Nash of the Rangers returned to action in Switzerland on Tuesday and Carl Hagelin played his first game for his hometown club in Sweden. They will be joined in Europe by their Rangers teammate Ryan McDonagh, who signed with a Kazakhstan-based...
abstract: Rick Nash of the Rangers returned to action in Switzerland on Tuesday and Carl Hagelin played his first game for his hometown club in Sweden. They will be joined in Europe by their Rangers teammate Ryan McDonagh, who signed with a Kazakhstan-based club in the Kontinental Hockey League.
lead_paragraph: 5:03 p.m. | Updated It was a fruitful Tuesday for Rick Nash and Carl Hagelin, two Rangers playing in Europe during the N.H.L. lockout.

headline.main: Rangers Roundup: Nash Scores, Hagelin Debuts and McDonagh Heads to K.H.L.
